Key: (Hm...? Huh? Where am I?)
*Yawn*...

(I'm... at school. Oh right, did I fall asleep
during class?)
Morning.
Ah, morning... wait.

It doesn't seem like it's morning. Did school end
already?

Yeah. Shido, you were asleep during the entire
afternoon class.

R-Really?! Crap, I have no memory of that... Was
I talking in my sleep or anything?

Unfortunately, no. However, you were sleeping
with a face that looked lazy.

Lazy, huh... Wow, I didn't know that I slept for
that long.
To be honest, you looked like a lazy pig.
Excuse me?
Tobiichi-saaaaan, you have a moment?
Tobiichi-san, I have a question too.
That's so lame.
They're calling me. I'll be going.
O-Okay.

(I feel like that last girl's statement was
directed towards me...)

(But Origami sure is popular. Well, I guess she's
not just a genius, but a super-elite student. It's
only natural.)

(Anyways, I guess I'll go home after I stop by the
bathroom.)
(Phew... I feel better, and now I'm wide awake.)

(I guess I'll just go home. What should I make for
dinner...?)

(Hm...? What's this? I feel something hard on my
back...?)
...Shido.
O-Origami?! What's the matter?

"Don't "what's the matter" me. Where do you think
you're going?"

Where? I mean, school's over, right?
Obviously home.

What are you talking about? I wasn't done talking
to you yet.

What are you talking about? I don't feel like we
were in the middle of a conversation.

You don't have the right to deny me. Don't turn
around. Just go straight to the classroom.

I can walk by myself, but... uh, Origami? What is
this hard thing pressed against my back...?

It's best that you don't know. If you did, I'd
have to do something about it.
I... I see.

You don't have to be so rigid. It's super painful,
but it doesn't have the power to kill.

It's super painful?! Wouldn't you say that's
torture?!
Hehehe...

That's so creepy... Wh-What are you
going to do...?

I told you earlier that we're just going to talk.
However, if you're going to resist, it won't end
there.
Just out of curiosity... What if I do resist...?
I'll make it... painful.
Whoa! Th-That's not funny...

And I can also read to the whole school all the
embarrassing poems you wrote during your junior
high days. Just while I'm at it.
That's way too intense!

If you don't like that, then I suggest you listen
to me. And you must show me respect and call
me Origami-sama.
O-Origami-sama? Why...

AHH! Okay, okay! Orig... Origami-sama! I won't
resist... I promise I won't!

Yes. You're my submissive slave. Then you know
what to do, right?
I know, I know! Walk! I'll walk, okay?!
I know you know, but any suspicious moves...
...So what did you want to talk to me about?
Might you consider your predicament?
I-I'm sorry.
I shall proceed. Shido, you slept all afternoon.
Y-Yeah.

You looked really lazy. You were clearly thinking
about another woman.
W-What? I don't know what you're talking about.

You were flirting with another woman
in your dreams.
Um, that's a baseless accusation.
It's equivalent to thousands of deaths.
You're blowing it out of proportion!

Then, what kind of dream were you having?
Tell me now.
Um... I wonder...

(I tried thinking, but I was fast asleep and can't
remember having any dreams.)

You can't play dumb like that. According to your
brain waves, I'm sure you were thinking about
a woman.
How can you measure that?

Quiet. Don't make any more excuses. You're going
to apologize and beg for forgiveness like the pig
you are... And I suppose I could forgive you.
Oh, come on. Now wait just a minute, Origami...
What was that tone...?
O-Origami-sama...
What? There's no point in making excuses.

I'm not making excuses, I just really don't
remember anything...
The lead angel howls into the sky... The adults\njust don't get it... I'm sure the time will\neventually come. But I have faith in love.

AHHHHHHHHH?! I-I'm sorry, I'm very sorry!
Origami-sama, Origami-sama, please stop!
You want to be honest with me now?

I really don't remember, though! I'll do anything,
but please just don't recite my poem with such
a serious face...

I see... I like your mindset. Then you'd best
prove yourself to me through your actions.
Do you understand?
Oh, um... Y-Yes... Uh...

Your head is too high in front of your master.
You are a mere slave.
M-Master...?

A master's orders are definitive. A servant must
respond quickly. But if you'd like, I can recite
from the, "Sun, go ahead and burn me" part.
I... I am sorry, Origami-sama...

It's truly calming. I know you're most suited for
crawling on the floor.
I... I am truly thankful for your praise.
How does the dirt taste?
Um, we're in the classroom...
What...?
No, it was nothing at all!

...I see. I suppose I could give you one more
chance. Answer me, Shido. What were you
dreaming of?

(Gah... Maybe I'm going to have to make something
up...)
A date with Tohka.
Taking a bath with Kotori.
Stepping into the forbidden garden with Tonomachi.
A date with... Tohka, I guess?
I commend your honesty.
Th-Thank you.
I hereby declare your execution.

Hey...! I thought there'd be more consideration
for circumstances like this.

Then let me ask you. What kind of date were you
having with Tohka Yatogami?

Well, uh.... The Tohka in my dream really just
pushed for it...
I suggest you answer my questions clearly.

Y-Yes. I-I believe we were walking and eating as
usual.
I hereby declare your execution.
Why?!

How dare you have fun eating with Tohka Yatogami
in your dreams. You are not properly behaving as
my servant, so your punishment will be execution.
But it was a dream! Please! Please forgive me.
If you really wish for it...
Then?

You're going to recite the words I'm
about to tell you.
Yes!
Please forgive me, Origami-sama.
Please forgive me, Origami-sama!
My body forever belongs to Origami-sama.
M-My body forever belongs to Origami-sama!
I want to smell Origami-sama's scalp.
I wa... huh?
I want to smell Origami-sama's scalp.

I...I want to smell Origami-sama's scalp... What
is up with that weird fetish?

You didn't put your heart into it. Back your words
with emotions, servant.

O-Okay! I would love to smell your scalp, Origami-
sama. Sir!

Very well. Then I shall lighten your punishment in
response to your show of respect.
Yes, sir―!

Rather than being executed, you must not eat
anything aside from crab.
Th-That's impossible.
I... had a dream of taking a bath with Kotori.

To touch your little sister is the ultimate level
of gross.
No, that's not what I was doing.
You creep. You low-life pervert.
I-I object. It's not like that...
(Did I make the wrong choice?)
You should change your name to Pedo.
Listen to me. It's not like that.
City hall is to the left of the school gates.

But I was only dreaming of a memory I had when
we were kids. It wasn't anything inappropriate...
No excuses. The worst punishment, no doubt.
Wh-What...

I have no choice but to release Shido Itsuka's
"secret file".
What... is that file? What's in it?

Your acapella recordings of that horrible
glam-idol song you made, back when you thought
you'd sing it at a school festival one day.

Noooooooooo! Why does such a thing still exist in
this world?! I thought I threw it away!

An informant extracted it from the trash and
attempted to restore it. I obtained it through
an agent of mine.

Then, it had to be Kotori! Or wait, was your agent
Reine-san?!

You are not in a position to ask questions, Shido.
If you don't want this exposed, tell me what you
must do next, Pedo.

Please, don't kill me so publicly, Origami-sama!
And if possible, please stop calling me Pedo!

I'm sorry, I couldn't hear you. I thought you
said, "Please step on me, Origami-sama.
Was that right?"
Huh? I didn't say that.

So are you saying your words are more accurate
than my ears, Shido? Despite your being my
servant?
Well, obviously! Because...

You should consider the predicament you're in,
Shido. Then maybe you can decide whether you
should talk back.
*Grunt*... I...

So what were you saying? Say it loud enough
for me to hear you.

Please step on me, Origami-sama. Please, please
step on me with your... holy foot.

If you insist... Very well.
...So, how does it feel?
To be stepped on like trash.

I-It makes me happy! I consider it the
highest honor!

I see. Good boy. If you're really happy,
oink for me.
O-Oink.

Just so you know, I'm recording this conversation.
I suppose I could send it to your beloved little
sister.
Wait, calm down!

I wonder what your little sister will think upon
hearing her brother's pathetic voice. She might
be so happy she'll cry.

Yeah, I can see her liking it! But more of a
reason to not do it! Please, could you be
less extorting?!
So you don't want me to send it?
Please don't!
You really don't want me to send it?
Please!
...If you say so.
Thank you, oh thank you so much.
And... sent.
Noooooooooooooooooo!

You see... I had a dream of stepping into the
forbidden garden with Tonomachi... *grunt* I can't
say any more. Oh, why did I have such a dream?!

Wait, so you like men...? If you dreamt it, then
the deepest level of your consciousness wanted
it. It has been deemed as your deepest wish.
That can't be! I swear it's not.
(I was just saying anything that came to mind.)

Oh, my word. So your relationship with
me was a sham.

I mean, our relationship aside, it's not like
that. It must be some kind of mistake.

I just came up with something fun. I'm going to
put your poems in a heart-shaped envelope and
put it in Tonomachi's mailbox.

What a horrible way to bring about my dark
past... Y-You're... not serious, are you?

Whether I'm serious or not is dependent on your
attitude.
I-I'll do anything. So please, anything but that.
You need to be rehabilitated, Shido.
Rehabilitated...?

That's right. You lack the proper mindset. That's
why you have weird dreams.
Um... you can't help what you dream.

That's not true. If you maintain a certain mindset
on a daily basis, then you should be able to
manipulate your dreams accordingly.
R-Really? Is that possible...?

Yes. That's why you must train, so you can have
healthy dreams.
Train?

First, you're going to recite, "I'm a pervert
ten times."
What?!

Just do it. Or else, you will be tainted by the
image of being a jolly man-lover.
(If I do that, I won't have a place in class...!)

I-I'm a pervert. I'm a pervert. I'm a pervert.
I'm a pervert. I'm a pervert. I'm a pervert.
I'm a pervert. I'm a pervert. I'm a pervert.

"That was pretty good. Next, repeat the words
"Origami Tobiichi" from the bottom of your heart
so it's massaged into your deepest consciousness."

Origami Tobiichi, Origami Tobiichi, Origami
Tobiichi, Origami Tobiichi, Origami Tobiichi,
Origami Tobiichi, Origami Tobiichi.
Then, what is this?
Elbow! Wait...? What are you talking about?
Don't mess around.
What?!

"Let's continue. Finally, say "I keep daydreaming
of inappropriate things with Origami. Every day,
I dream of her in a perverted way" ten times."

Long. That's too long?! And that isn't even an
appropriate dream!

(And so Origami tortured me like this until the
sun disappeared over the horizon.)
